number([],Result,Result).
number([Img|Imgs], Acc, Result) :- digit(Img, Nr), NewAcc is Acc * 10 + Nr, number(Imgs, NewAcc, Result).
number(X,Y) :- number(X,0,Y).
multi_addition(X,Y,Z) :- 
 number(X, XNum), number(Y, YNum), Z is XNum + YNum.
query(multi_addition([img_7,img_9],[img_3,img_1,img_2],Z)).

The code is logically correct and meets the requirements, demonstrating consistency with the original code's approach while adding more complex number handling.
